website_summaries.verdict: A popular choice for good reason, this is a gorgeous bag with the best Michael Kors has to offer at a surprisingly low price – versatile styling, classic looks, and spacious design.
pros: Not only will this classic bag complement numerous looks, but the generous interior with several slip pockets will fit and organize numerous items
Genuine leather available in a variety of colors
cons: Some complaints about the durability of the straps
they have been know to come loose at the seams or break altogether

customer_reviews.title: This is not leather as advertised, the workmanship is very bad.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this item, and when it arrived today I was very disappointed. It is advertised to be leather, and it is not. It is a very low quality item, ostensibly not leather, but plastic, very rough. I have had another MK handbags and I am afraid this seems like a very bad knock off
customer_reviews.author: Concepcion Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Good value @ $156
customer_reviews.text: I like this tote, not sure it's built to be a daily bag, but I like the design and color. Smaller than I thought it would be (has the same dimensions as my Hamilton satchel but far less usable space esp. when zipped.)
customer_reviews.author: Nia E.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This purse is beautiful and functional, I LOVE it. *BUT* the "Pink Grapefruit" color in the picture looks VERY orange, but when I received it it really was a PG color, which was really great, I love the PG color, but just be aware that it's not orange. Also, the shipping was between 06/13-06/15, and I got it on the 16th. This wouldn't have been an issue, except that Amazon and FedEx gave me 3 different ship dates. So that was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I just love it! It's a beautiful purse and has a zipper so my items don't spill out.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first MK bag! And I'm in love! Such a great quality. Came packaged very nicely and also came with a beautiful dust bag....love that! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TheresaP

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Purse!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. Just the right size and it arrived in just a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa ♡

customer_reviews.title: Great price bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag. its not to heavy and it has many compartments. I never put it on the floor, I hang it in my desk and on my closet, the handles lasted so far. I've been using it for about 3 months
customer_reviews.author: nica p

customer_reviews.title: Nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would a little bit larger bag but it definitely a deal breaker It's very classy and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!
customer_reviews.text: I thing is a fake and replicated item from China!
customer_reviews.author: Don't work properly

customer_reviews.title: Genuine
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Kors, looks great, lots of compliments! Recommend the Jet Set wallet to match
customer_reviews.author: K. Fifield

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: she loves it, great quality, decent price exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in size
customer_reviews.text: I Love the size. I can fit quite a bit in there. Not overly big. Just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love Love  Love
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my Michael Kors tote I just received it today. OMG it looks beautiful the quality is great I love my new tote. I am extremely please with my purchase. Highly recommend purchasing this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Very pleased.  Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning craftmanship. I love it. Great seller. I'll be back.
customer_reviews.author: Capnjaneway

customer_reviews.title: She LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I’m a hero for at least one thing...
customer_reviews.author: W. Rauer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: OMG...I absolutely love this bag. Just the right size. I just feel bad for spending so much for a pocketbook because i change pocketbooks like people change their underwear.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Truffle color
customer_reviews.text: My girl loved this bag. And, the color goes with everything she wears.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice without any signs of wear
customer_reviews.text: Nice without any signs of wear. I am very pleased. This was a very nice transaction in ever way! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and exactly like the picture. I can’t wait to use it! I’m so pleased with my purchase and am glad I didn’t have to pay an extreme amount for it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Purse came in MK wrapping and was the real deal My mother loved it for her birthday
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first but once it arrived days before it said it will be delivered I was very very impressed ! Purse came in MK wrapping and was the real deal My mother loved it for her birthday !
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is only the best that me and all our friends can tell about this beauty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Veniaminov

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It is the best purse I have bought. Legit. 💕 the color. So cheery.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves purses and has several Michael Kors products but she's crazy about this camel colored purse
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Green

customer_reviews.title: Very good quaility! Can't wait to give it to them
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Present! Very good quaility! Can't wait to give it to them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hysaw

customer_reviews.title: The color is beautiful and I get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Material is not leather but cheap plastic. The color is beautiful and I get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my product. Items it's exactly as I saw it online.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag but I thought it was bigger but that was my error...
customer_reviews.author: rachel sheppard

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women’s Jet Set Item Tote
product_meta.description:
Jet setters, take note: this sophisticated, multi-tasking tote is the ultimate travel accomplice. Crafted from saffiano—a matte leather that’s both distinctive and durable sports a look that’s chic yet understated. A multitude of pockets keeps you organized, while the top-zip design ensures your essentials stay put, wherever you may go.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :15 x 4.49 x 10 inches; 3.52 Ounces
 * Item model number :30F2GTTT8L
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :June 10, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B071WZW6V1

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #145,115 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #65235 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #588 inWomen's Tote Handbags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars154 ratings Jet setters, take note: this sophisticated, multi-tasking tote is the ultimate travel accomplice. Crafted from saffiano—a matte leather that’s both distinctive and durable sports a look that’s chic yet understated. A multitude of pockets keeps you organized, while the top-zip design ensures your essentials stay put, wherever you may go.
feature_bullets: Two Exterior Side Pockets, Interior Zip Pocket, Interior Cell Phone Pocket, Three Interior Pouch Pockets, Keyfob
